channel.title: Sinsec 742 ECO| 614 PK| 317 PK | Vote4Cash || AutoDonate || UNIQUE CONTENT
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/foev43p.jpg[/img]
Sinsec | 24/7 | 718/742||614PK||317PK
What has changed? We have updated from 718/724 to 742, therefore this has brought many new features! Every day we push through new updates that the players suggest! We now have a pking server called Sinsec 317! Why would you want to join? We listen to the community. The community is the most important part of any game or server and on Sinsec you will find yourself in one of the best RSPS communities. We also have excellent staff, and we work every day to improve our server. Sinsec is an economy focused server. We are constantly adding content to the server that the players want! There are many features in-game, and you can see a list below and link with all the links needed to play.
742 links Webclient: http://sinsec.no-ip.org/webclient.php Forums: http://sinsec.no-ip.org/forum/ Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?ygy059oy67jakax
317 links Webclient: http://sinsec.no-ip.org/webclient317.php Client: http://sinsec.no-ip.org/sinsec317.jar Forums: http://sinsec.no-ip.org/forum/
614 links Webclient: http://sinsec.no-ip.org/614/webclient.html Client: http://sinsec.no-ip.org/614/client.jar Forums: http://sinsec.no-ip.org/forum You must register on the forums to play on the server, this stops spam, and keeps the real players separated from spam bots.
742 Features - VPS Hosted 24/7 - 300MB/s Uplink - No lag - Stable Economy - 100% Uptime - Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic - 138 combat, summoning counts - Constant Updates - Professional and active Staff - Active Clean Forums - Old and new Runescape Armor - DonatorZone (with shops) - Loyalty point system with shop (300 points every 30mins) - Various shops. - Dominion Tower - Lava Flow Mining - Jadinko Lair - Frost Dragons - Bork - Tormented Demons - New Godwars (Zaros/Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin) - Squeal of fortune. - Bone's on altar. - Hunter. - All the GodWars Dungeons. - Fully working Nex. - Curses, ancients etc. - Working Revenants. - Queen Black Dragon - Fight Kiln - Fight Caves - Custom Dung! - Working chaotics - Working Flowers and Dicing - Money pouch - Working clan wars! - Great staff and community - fully working slayer and slayer tower! - Auto-Voting - Auto-Donate - Great PvP and switching - Owner takes all ideas into consideration. - Perfect switching - unique home
317 Features Auto Donate Auto Voting Perfect Switching Great pvp Fully working slayer and slayer tower Great Staff Customs Great donorzone VPS Hosted 24/7 - 300MB/s Uplink No lag Stable Economy 100% Uptime - Newest Runescape Hitmarks - Better Combat. - Friendly and active community. - Server & Website Daily Updates. - Very Stable. - 602 Skilltab. - A team of hard working developer's ready to add new content. - Pk Points for killing players. - Voting Points both with amazing reward shops. - Donation system with points to buy items from shops. - Plenty of bosses to defeat! - Newest loading bar and log in screen - Fully Working XP Counter (With sprite flow & comma support) 614 Features Over 7 different PvP locations! Eco based spawn PvP based Killstreak system Solely based on PvP Perfect Briding Curse Prayers Perfect Special Attacks Perfect Switching Active PvP locations Stable Eco Dicing PVP shop Dedicated staff 24/7 Auto Donation Auto Vote
Media: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bdwEwzl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4t3MtlB.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jHjzAu8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/M9JSYZt.png[/img] [/center]

item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Sinsec742, post:3, topic:522191”]Img tags don’t work with prntscreen… Hence why I didn’t put it.[/quote]then don’t use printscreen to quote what I said on another thread

people are lazy on here and if you want people to actually look at the method and be able to judge if the server is any good then you need to post using actual images and not links to images.

I’m assuming you are hosting these difference servers on different vps’s? How do all of these correlate? Is there a global friends list?

Read full topic

[center]

foev43p.jpg1803×461

Sinsec | 24/7 | 718/742||614PK||317PK

What has changed?
We have updated from 718/724 to 742, therefore this has brought many new features!
Every day we push through new updates that the players suggest!
We now have a pking server called Sinsec 317!
Why would you want to join?
We listen to the community. The community is the most important part of any game or server and on Sinsec you will find yourself in one of the best RSPS communities. We also have excellent staff, and we work every day to improve our server. Sinsec is an economy focused server.
We are constantly adding content to the server that the players want!
There are many features in-game, and you can see a list below and link with all the links needed to play.

You must register on the forums to play on the server, this stops spam, and keeps the real players separated from spam bots.
